page.title: 02The M3 motorway
page.content: The bypass today is dangerous. It goes through Compton and Shawford and spli- ts the village in half. The new motor- way will have many more lanes and less bends, that means it will be quieter and safer. One of the big differences is that it will be much higher. That means it will be on a mound. The mound will go from Hockley to Compton House, so that the motorway will go over the railway instead of under. There won't be a junction on the top of Compton Down instead the Otterbourne Road will go over the motorway to Compton. It will also be much less busy around Compton Street. The motorway will cut off a corner of Shawford Down, so some other land is going to be given to the parish. The work men are planning to plant trees and natural plants. There are lots of arguments about the motorway.
